# Library
```{r, message=FALSE}
library(zoo)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggpubr)
library(patchwork)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(gridExtra)
library(grid)
library(readr)
library(latex2exp)
# library(MASS) 
library(scales)
library(patchwork)
options(scipen=1000000)

# --- Main path to all data ---
data_path <- "~/Code/infomercial/data/"
```

# Load
```{r}
# Min row size
min_row <- 200

# What to load, and its names
exp_names <-
  c("exp650",
    "exp651",
    "exp652",
    "exp653",
    "exp654")
agent_names <- c("WSLS",
                 "Diffusion",
                 "Chemotaxis",
                 "Infotaxis",
                 "Reward")
colors <- c("firebrick4",
            "lightskyblue4",
            "olivedrab4",
            "orange3",
            "orange4")
# ---
results_650_654 <- NULL

for (i in 1:length(exp_names)) {
  # Meta
  exp_name <- exp_names[i]
  agent_name <- agent_names[i]
  
  # Load
  result <-
    read_csv(paste(data_path, exp_name, "_sorted.csv", sep = ""),
             show_col_types = FALSE)
  
  result$exp <- exp_name
  result$agent <- agent_name
  
  # Some results_650_654 only have on row. Pad to min_row
  # to make vis simple later on.
  i <- 2
  while(nrow(result) < min_row){
    tmp <- result[1,]
    tmp$index <- tmp$index + i
    result <- bind_rows(result, tmp)
    i <- i + 1
  }
  
  # Save
  results_650_654 <- bind_rows(results_650_654, result)
}

# Order
results_650_654$agent <- factor(results_650_654$agent, levels = agent_names)
```

# Vis
## Ranked
```{r, fig.width=6, fig.height=2}
results_650_654 %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = index, y = total_R, color = agent)) +
  geom_line(size = 2, alpha = 0.6) +
  labs(x = "Rank", y = "Total reward") +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(strip.background = element_blank()) +
  theme(legend.position = "nane") +
  theme(panel.spacing = unit(1, "lines")) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(0, 100, 200)) +
  scale_color_manual("", values = colors) +
  facet_grid(. ~ agent) 
```
